channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 9th February
item.description:
Customer reporting possible collapse of drain in carriageway leaving hole approx 20cm deep & approx 30cm in circumference
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes/ totally damaged road surface, 9th February
item.description:
Caused double blowout of passenger side tyres on vehicle evening of 5th February 2026. Road surface totally shot and requires resurfacing urgently. The road needs closing to complete these works urgently and stop other people damaging their vehicles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 9th February
item.description:

item.title: Very dangerous and deep pothole, 9th February
item.description:
This pothole is near the centre of the east bound carriageway, just as you approach the old railway bridge on the Andoversford to B on the W road, the A436. It has claimed 2 victims this morning (9th Feb). It is very dangerous and deeper than a golf ball!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The whole of Swindon Road has pot holes and are hard to avoid, traffic slows down and cars moving to avoid said pot holes which is dsangerous, also there is water poruing doen the rod either from the new builds or somewhere else!, 9th February
item.description:
The whole of the road from the racecourse round about (Evesham Road) to Tommy Tailors lane round mini about. The new houses on Swindon Road seems to have water pouring out of it and therefore it is running down the road to the mini round about.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
